title: Villeneuve-de-la-Raho
content:
Villeneuve-de-la-Raho (French pronunciation: [vilnœv də la ʁa.o] ⓘ; Catalan: Vilanova de Raó) is a commune in the Pyrénées-Orientales department, southern France.

Villeneuve-de-la-Raho is located in the canton of La Plaine d'Illibéris and in the arrondissement of Perpignan. The town is the location of Lac de Villeneuve-de-la-Raho.

This Pyrénées-Orientales geographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
